metadata.name: War
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Classic two-player card battle game. Higher card wins the round!

cards.note: Standard 52-card deck split evenly between player and computer

instructions.overview: Battle against the computer in the classic card game War. Each round, both players flip their top card - highest card wins both cards! The goal is to capture all 52 cards.
setup: The deck is shuffled and split evenly
Cards are placed in your respective draw piles
gameplay: Both you and the computer flip your top card
Cards are compared - highest value wins
Winner takes both cards and adds them to bottom of their deck
Card values: Ace (highest) = 14, King = 13, Queen = 12, Jack = 11, 10-2 = face value
If cards tie, both cards are removed from play (simplified War rules)
Continue until one player runs out of cards
instructions.winning: Win by capturing all cards from your opponent. You lose if you run out of cards first.

examples.title: Tie - Cards Removed
